Package learning

Class GeneticAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
learning.GeneticAlgorithm
public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the genetic algorithm base used for training a neural network structure.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> bestNeuralNetwork
    This Neural Network is the current network with the highest score.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> scores
    This list of floats will contain the current scores for the neural networks.

  • Constructor Details

    • GeneticAlgorithm

      public GeneticAlgorithm​(NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> nn, int population, FitnessFunction scoring)
      This constructor will instantiate the Genetic algorithm with a base neural network, population, and a fitness function.
      Parameters:
      nn - This parameter will be the base neural network that will be trained.
      population - This parameter will be the number of neural networks that may be created at one time for training.
      scoring - This parameter will be the function that determines and scores the fitness of a neural network.

  • Method Details

    • getNeuralNetworkArrayList

      public java.util.ArrayList<NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>>> getNeuralNetworkArrayList()
      This method returns the current list of neural networks within the genetic algorithm.
      Returns:
      List of NeuralNetwork's

    • setNeuralNetworkArrayList

      public void setNeuralNetworkArrayList​(java.util.ArrayList<NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>>> neuralNetworkArrayList)
      This method will replace the current list of neural networks with the one provided.
      Parameters:
      neuralNetworkArrayList - This parameter will become the new list of neural networks.

    • getBase

      public NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> getBase()
      This method returns the original neural network provided during instantiation.
      Returns:
      NeuralNetwork

    • setBase

      public void setBase​(NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> base)
      This method will replace the current base neural network provided at instantiation.
      Parameters:
      base - This parameter will become the new base neural network.

    • mutateAll

      public void mutateAll​(float rate, float magnitude)
      This method will mutate all the current neural networks. It will mutate rate amount of their nodes by the magnitude amount.
      Parameters:
      rate - This parameter will be the rate nodes from each neural network to mutate.
      magnitude - This parameter will be the total amount that a node may mutate by.

    • getAllScores

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> getAllScores()
      This method will return the fitness score of all the current neural networks.
      Returns:
      List of floats
      See Also:
      FitnessFunction, FitnessFunctions

    • getTopNNs

      public java.util.ArrayList<NeuralNetwork<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>>> getTopNNs​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> scores, java.lang.Float percent)
      This method will return the top percent of Neural Networks, given their score.
      Parameters:
      scores - This parameter is the scores of the current Neural Network.
      percent - This parameter is the percent of the top neural networks to retrieve.
      Returns:
      List of NeuralNetwork's

    • evolve

      public void evolve​(float topPercentToKeep, float mutatePercent, float mutateMagnitude)
      This method will go through the next generation of neural networks by evolving the current ones. This will
      • Score and retrieve the top Neural Networks
      • Breed the top Neural Networks to replenish the population
      • Mutate the new generation of Neural Networks
      Parameters:
      topPercentToKeep - This parameter is the percent of top parents breed for the next generation
      mutatePercent - This parameter will be the percent nodes from each neural network to mutate.
      mutateMagnitude - This parameter will be the total amount that a node may mutate by.
      See Also:
      GeneticAlgorithmUtil.mutate(NeuralNetwork, float, float), GeneticAlgorithmUtil.crossover(NeuralNetwork, NeuralNetwork)
